title: Analyze particle motion from velocity part - a

content.description: A particle moves along the y-axis so that its velocity at any time t ≥ 0 is given by v(t)=t cos t . At time t =0 , the position of the particle is y = 3 .
content.question: For what values of t, 0 ≤ t ≤ 5 , is the particle moving upward?

frqParts.text: For what values of t, 0 ≤ t ≤ 5 , is the particle moving upward?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
